Tucson could sense Talon close to him and gives her a heart felt smile and =
gently holds her hand.  The look on his face tells of a priceless feeling o=
f perpetual joy that could only be felt when in the company of those you lo=
ve.  He had found happiness the moment he met her, which to him was far mor=
e valuable than the most powerful weapon in the universe.  What better way =
to express one's love and the joy it brings by giving something back that i=
s as precious as love itself.  He was ready to take the next step.  As Rodi=
mus graced Nightlight by fathering a child, so promised Tucson as he gently=
 holds her hand.

" Talon, I have yet to give you something.  A gift truly =
which comes from my spark.  A family is formed when the love of two sparks =
come together as one.  And as you have given me so much of your heart, I wo=
uld like to give you so much more of mine.  That of course, is if you want =
me to.  I promise not to do anything unless you conscent to it first."

---=
